casebody.data:
Captain Sheriff SAUDI, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. S/T MARINE ATLANTIC, etc., et al., Defendants, Jurong Shipping, Ltd., Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-21045. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 1, 2003. Afton Jane Izen, Joe Alfred Izen, Jr., Izen & Associates, Bellaire, TX, for Plaintiff-Appellant.

Before SMITH, BARKSDALE, and CLEMENT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.*

AFFIRMED. See 5th Cir. R. 47.6.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under *506the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
